title: How It Works Illustrated - History Of The World (Issue 1, 2014)
description:
This first issue of How it Works Illustrated presents an amazing history of the entire world, from the big bang to the present day, covering dinosaurs, the romans, Vikings, pirates and the World Wars along the way.

How It Works Illustrated is everything you love about learning. Packed with fascinating stories about the world around us, each 132 page issue is dedicated to explaining everything readers want to know about one mind blowing topic. As well as amazing stories and features, How It Works Illustrated also offers brain-busting puzzles, challenges and quizzes to stimulate your mind and truly bring learning to life.

History of the World

Prehistoric Earth
- How was the Earth formed and how big were the dinosaurs

Ancient Civilisations
- Learn all about pharaohs, romans and greeks

Kings and Queens
- What happened to the six wives of Henry VIII.

The modern world
- From the industrial revolution to the moon landing


Also inside...
- How did early humans live?
- Who invented the alphabet?
- How did vikings raid?
- Who was the youngest king?
- What was the renaissance?
- Which pirate was most murderous?

How It Works Illustrated - History Of The World (Issue 1, 2014)
Book Language: English 
Pages: 132
File Type: Pdf
